title: 독립적이고 썩지 않으며 파괴 할 수 없습니다.
paragraphA: We're a team of highly motivated experts with a single shared goal: universal data privacy.
paragraphB: With the HOPR protocol, companies and users can decide for themselves who can view their data and who can't.
paragraphC: With the HOPR protocol, data security is solved, letting everyone focus on helping people through digitalization.
paragraphD: The HOPR community is building the digital privacy landscape of tomorrow. We invite everybody to join our movement.
paragraphE: Learn more about the team that builds the HOPR network.
